page.title: 03SW BASINGSTOKE: HOUSING 2
page.content: The houses are{brick}built with { {tiled}roofs. Some have tiled front and back panels whilst others have a wooden fascia. { Kempshott}has{private, detached} houses with secluded gardens. All have integral or tandem garages. There are usually 3 or 4 bedrooms, also separate toilet and bathroom. Downstairs is a hallway (with stairs off) opening to a dining room and lounge. There may also be a study. In{rural}areas houses are few and far between. They are typically small{ {cottages}with 2 rooms downstairs and 2 bedrooms upstairs. Many have bathrooms added later. There are also a few farm houses which are larger in size. There is one large Manor-house. Many of the cottages have thatched roofs. Some are terraced others stand on their own.
